title: An Inside Look at the U.S. Senate
teaser: The United States Senate's first official historian joins Kathleen to offer an insider's look into the chambers and the men and women who have defined the American political landscape. In his latest book, the historian explores the Senate's historical evolution and how partisanship has come to define the body in recent decades.
